name: A_Slice_of_Lynch
text:
A Slice of Lynch
A Slice of Lynch is a behind-the-scenes featurette originally released with the 2007 DVD Twin Peaks: Definitive Gold Box Edition. It features a conversation between Twin Peaks co-creator David Lynch, actors Mädchen Amick and Kyle MacLachlan, and post-production supervisor John Wentworth.
An uncut version of the featurette was released with the Blu-ray releases Twin Peaks: The Entire Mystery (2014) and Twin Peaks: From Z to A (2019).
